title: Beijing National Stadium
content: The National Stadium[3] (国家体育场), a.k.a Bird's Nest (鸟巢),[4] is a stadium at Olympic Green in Chaoyang, Beijing, China. The National Stadium, covering an area of 204,000 square meters with 91,000 capacity, broke ground in December 2003, officially started construction in March 2004, and was completed in June 2008.[5]
